body: like whoa this doujin went from 0 to 100 real fucking quick

Honestly, can we get a normal  Ranma Half doujin where Ranma is actually a guy and fucks randomly anyone from his harem? Dude is one of my favorite anime MC who is extremely manly, yet 90% of his doujins are him getting his ass gender-bended and fucked like there is no tomorrow.
